level.heading: RELEASE OF INFORMATION (§ 7-3209) Nothing in the Act or this chapter shall require a health care professional toisclose information in violation of section 1177 of the Social Security Act,ffective August 21, 1996 (110 Stat. 2029; 42 U.S.C. § 1320d-6) or theegulations promulgated pursuant to section 264(c) of the Health Insuranceortability and Accountability Act of 1996, effective August 21, 1996 (110 Stat.033; 42 U.S.C §1320d-2 note). Information provided to an employer pursuant to §§ 3206, 3207, or 3208 shallot be disclosed by the employer, except when such disclosure is: Requested or consented to by the employee; Ordered by a court or administrative agency; or Otherwise required by federal or local law.
